channel.title: Devolution 1.1.4 - Last of the Devo series forever.. Perfect Combat, Minigames
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][U][SIZE=3][COLOR=DarkSlateGray]Thanks for Downloading Devolution 1.1.4 Source[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U][/B]
This source was created to stop the use of Delta servers, as well to show Bakatool he is no longer a superior programmer. [SIZE=1][ ^ the guy doesn't even write proper statements ^ ][/SIZE]
Devolution 1.0 created by Winten Devolution 1 - 7 by Winten & Bakatool Devolution 2.5, 2.7 by Killamess Devolution 1.1, 1.1.1, 1.1.4 by Josh. [SIZE=1]^ We can program, yet not count from 1 - 10 ^ [7.0 > 2.7 > 1.1.4][/SIZE] Thanks for everything you did for me Baka, too bad you've changed into a worse person than my miserable neighbor
[U][B] Source [anti leech fix has been posted in tutorials, for the Mopar community is half retarded][/B][/U] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/2591cf3cf01ba869e47a1208a0696c3c"][IMG]http://www.inmr.net/icon/download.png[/img][/URL]
[U][B]Client[/B][/U] [URL=http://"http://ambitionstudio.com/myclient/Dev%201.1.4%20Client.zip"][IMG]http://www.inmr.net/icon/download.png[/img][/URL]
Leave me comments.
[U]Features - [/U] [B]-Combat-[/B] - Perfect PvP [credits to Killamess, touch ups by me] -- Autocasting on Player -- Ranging Follow -- All specials work 100% -- Perfect timers -- Attack,Block,Gfx,Height all modified and written properly -- Melee Following - Near Perfect PvN - Perfect Special Attacks - Perfect Godwars with kill count and such - Perfect Pest Control - Perfect Fightpits - Perfect FightCaves - 80% Slayer & Tasks [B]-Skills-[/B] - Slayer [ 80%] - Woodcutting [78%] - Agility [100%] - Herblore [70%] - Firemaking [100%} - Runecrafting [65%] - Thieving [80%] - Crafting [100%] - Fishing [100%] - Mining [100%] - Blacksmith [80%, no smelting interface, includes armor building interface and works 100%] - cooking [100%]
Client Work - jFrame with click able links - All Godwars Bosses - 508 Greater and Lesser, Rats, Imps - All godwars sub-bosses - 508 Dark Beast - Tormented Demon - Barrel-chest - All godswords + pieces - All Godsword emotes + GFX 100% - Barrel-Chest GFX + walk,run,attack,block - Lunars emote + gfx - 508 Shop + Bank interface - RS2 HP Bar - HD Textures [Graham] - Extending Emotes + GFX List - Clean Codes - Transparent Magic box - Most 474 Interfaces
[B]Misc. Additions[/B] - Josh's Tutorial Island [95%] - Kill Count meters - NPC poisoning - Player poisoning - Ancient effects on handlers - bolt, shield, weapon GFX on handlers - three quests O.O - Player Saving - Summoned = true/false; - Barrow Bro's Tunnels with mini bosses - Anti Dupe [100% all Devolution Dupes] - 103 Bug's fixed - Trading 2nd Screen eating glitch dupe Fixed - Anti Attack Self - Anti Cheater client bugs - Cleaner source - Enabled for Bluurs or #317 Clean or Deob . - Best #317 Source Available - Josh - clickItem.java
[COLOR=Red] Fix your Devolution 1.1.4 Anti Leech fast and easy! [QUOTE][URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429649.0.html]Click here to fix your anti leech[/URL][/QUOTE][/COLOR] -Media-
Youtube - [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qFEn6yKz5uk]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qFEn6yKz5uk[/URL] - Client Detail [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iHw2-elK8SI]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iHw2-elK8SI[/URL] - Combat System
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/wvr2gg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2e3s54z.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/f87d9a46-7d79-46c5-a9e2-be4809788ec9/output.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/1b7734d4-1c6b-48ba-8f58-b53954489094/output.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/f1887633-4a8b-4929-9939-6f6ffc1b0ed3/output.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/67a3e4ce-f78e-47d3-8b48-e99834ac71f8/output.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/1921960f-9a2f-4e55-80bc-05ced58b9b86/output.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/0d1aeb9a-07dc-453f-afdb-c04ce2f2b7db/output.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/c9e5774d-e2c2-4694-ba5e-fd36a64c7092/output.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/33d7ad91-d210-4d29-83dc-e6fb78ae59a7/output.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/cd77f8b1-404d-42cf-9158-f1edfd75268f/output.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2q3sv1k.jpg[/img]
Let me remind you. This is premade, does not mean ready to go. All mini's and such are made in "Source Folder name > Server >Players > Minigames
Set the object clicking yourself, I'm not spoon feeding you any more than I already have.
Everything made on this source is not perfect, but pretty damn near.
This source was created to show the world that Devo > Delta. Infact, everything is greater than [Delta] Delta is disgusting. No need for TuT's on this, everything is named accordingly, for instance for getting the magic information for PK search up "gathermagicinfopvp" and the codes are all written in English so, if you can't read I suggest you learn. This is not hard to code, it is all packaged so whatever you want is in a proper folder. Read the words, don't get stumped by the use of letters and numbers, you learn language and math daily in school don't you?
Shall you require assistance on this or any other [Devo] or any source [B]other[/B] than Delta, please PM me or contact me at [EMAIL="Joshmai@live.com"]Joshmai@live.com[/EMAIL]
Quote for "LMFAO" [QUOTE]Jason says: * *Why would you release devo *Fuck *Honestly... Josh says: *its epic *thats why. Jason says: *Dude you should've made the anti leech like impossible *It's epic *TOO epic *People don't deserve it bruh *Christa said she luvz yew. *Wow *Then you tell people how to do the antileech * [b]I should bite your fingers off so you cant type any more prime ass sources, then I can take win!![/b] [/QUOTE]Jason is epic.
[/CENTER]

Devolution 1.0 created by Winten

[SIZE=1]^ We can program, yet not count from 1 - 10 ^
[7.0 > 2.7 > 1.1.4][/SIZE]
Thanks for everything you did for me Baka, too bad you’ve changed into a worse person than my miserable neighbor


Source [anti leech fix has been posted in tutorials, for the Mopar community is half retarded]

Client

Leave me comments.

Features -
-Combat-

  • Perfect PvP [credits to Killamess, touch ups by me]
    – Autocasting on Player
    – Ranging Follow
    – All specials work 100%
    – Perfect timers
    – Attack,Block,Gfx,Height all modified and written properly
    – Melee Following
  • Near Perfect PvN
  • Perfect Special Attacks
  • Perfect Godwars with kill count and such
  • Perfect Pest Control
  • Perfect Fightpits
  • Perfect FightCaves
  • 80% Slayer & Tasks
    -Skills-
  • Slayer [ 80%]
  • Woodcutting [78%]
  • Agility [100%]
  • Herblore [70%]
  • Firemaking [100%}
  • Runecrafting [65%]
  • Thieving [80%]
  • Crafting [100%]
  • Fishing [100%]
  • Mining [100%]
  • Blacksmith [80%, no smelting interface, includes armor building interface and works 100%]
  • cooking [100%]

Client Work

  • jFrame with click able links
  • All Godwars Bosses
  • 508 Greater and Lesser, Rats, Imps
  • All godwars sub-bosses
  • 508 Dark Beast
  • Tormented Demon
  • Barrel-chest
  • All godswords + pieces
  • All Godsword emotes + GFX 100%
  • Barrel-Chest GFX + walk,run,attack,block
  • Lunars emote + gfx
  • 508 Shop + Bank interface
  • RS2 HP Bar
  • HD Textures [Graham]
  • Extending Emotes + GFX List
  • Clean Codes
  • Transparent Magic box
  • Most 474 Interfaces

Misc. Additions

  • Josh’s Tutorial Island [95%]
  • Kill Count meters
  • NPC poisoning
  • Player poisoning
  • Ancient effects on handlers
  • bolt, shield, weapon GFX on handlers
  • three quests O.O
  • Player Saving
  • Summoned = true/false;
  • Barrow Bro’s Tunnels with mini bosses
  • Anti Dupe [100% all Devolution Dupes]
  • 103 Bug’s fixed
  • Trading 2nd Screen eating glitch dupe Fixed
  • Anti Attack Self
  • Anti Cheater client bugs
  • Cleaner source
  • Enabled for Bluurs or #317 Clean or Deob .
  • Best #317 Source Available - Josh
  • clickItem.java

[COLOR=Red]
Fix your Devolution 1.1.4 Anti Leech fast and easy!

Click here to fix your anti leech

-Media-

Youtube -
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qFEn6yKz5uk - Client Detail
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iHw2-elK8SI - Combat System

Let me remind you. This is premade, does not mean ready to go. All mini’s and such are made in "Source Folder name > Server >Players > Minigames

Set the object clicking yourself, I’m not spoon feeding you any more than I already have.

Everything made on this source is not perfect, but pretty damn near.

This source was created to show the world that Devo > Delta. Infact, everything is greater than [Delta] Delta is disgusting.
No need for TuT’s on this, everything is named accordingly, for instance for getting the magic information for PK search up “gathermagicinfopvp” and the codes are all written in English so, if you can’t read I suggest you learn. This is not hard to code, it is all packaged so whatever you want is in a proper folder. Read the words, don’t get stumped by the use of letters and numbers, you learn language and math daily in school don’t you?

Shall you require assistance on this or any other [Devo] or any source other than Delta, please PM me or contact me at Joshmai@live.com
